price: 而舍弃你们的养主为你们创造的妻子呢？其实，你们是过分的民众。”
arabic: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمۡ رَبُّكُم مِّنۡ أَزۡوَٰجِكُمۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٌ عَادُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: watadharūna mā khalaqa lakum rabbukum min azwājikum bal antum qawmun ʿādūna
